reviewText: If you like the divas from WWF now know as WWE.This is a must have in your video collection.Your not gonna find this on DVD.You get to see lots of skin. The Kat's flash from Armageddon in 2000.Tori , Trish Stratus & Ivory in wet tshirts that will make your jaw drop !
summary: WWF Divas - Postcard from the Caribbean
Title: WWF: Divas - Postcard from the Caribbean VHS

reviewText: Vince McMahon is a marketing genius.  That is why the World Wrestling Federation does so well, and is always on the top of it's game.This video jumps into the lives of WWF Women Superstars Ivory, the Kat, Terri, Tori, and Trish.  Not only are these women quite beautiful, but they truly are remarkable athletes.  The video shows some great ring footage of these ladies, and it has some nice interview time with each one.  On a complete sidenote, I feel that Ivory is one of the most energetic, charismatic people in the sport today, and I was happy that she was featured in this video.The footage is really good, and the editing was superb.  Of course, any red-blooded man will enjoy this video, but in all honesty, it is done in really good taste.  Anything that Vince McMahon puts his name on is going to be gold, and "WWF Divas - Post Cards From the Caribbean" certainly adheres to this standard.
Title: WWF: Divas - Postcard from the Caribbean VHS

reviewText: The WWF definately outdoes itself here with divas: postcard from the Carribean.If your a fan of any diva and want to see them as you wouldn't see them on tv, buy this. it was probably the best (price) i ever spent. there's plenty of wet t-shirt footage if you like that as well.
Title: WWF: Divas - Postcard from the Caribbean VHS

reviewText: LOVE THIS VIDEO OF THE DIVAS OF THE PAST! WHEN I GOT THIS VIDEO I KNEW I HAD TO WATCH IT! YES! IT WAS AWESOME! EACH STORY WAS INTERESTING AND VERY FUN TO WATCH. IT'S A MUST HAVE IF YOU ARE A TRUE DIVAS FAN. IT WAS DIFFERENT FOR ME BECAUSE IT WAS ON A VHS TAPE BUT IT WAS STILL AWESOME. THIS VIDEO ROCKS! THAT'S ALL I'M GOING TO SAY BUDDIES! GET IT!
Title: WWF: Divas - Postcard from the Caribbean VHS

reviewText: The first one really is the best! If you aren't buying this just because all of the ladies are gone..you are a jack-off! *lol* It shows some in ring stuff as well as the ladies in really skimpy and tight clothing and in some cases,what they're wearing shouldn't be considered clothing. The WWE really did have alot more attitude back in the day and the product was alot more edgy. You can see Kat's and Tori's breasts in this..don't worry, they censor Mae Young! Buy it if you're a fan, you will love it.
Title: WWF: Divas - Postcard from the Caribbean VHS

reviewText: Nowadays the Divas are pretty stunning, but years before they still look sexy and beautiful! Trish, Ivory, Tori, Kat, and Terri all show off their stuffs and it's amazing! The feature is just like any other Diva segments, where each Diva show off their great bodies and tell us a little info on their lives.Tori is my favorite out of the bunch, because she's so powerful and smart at the same time! She gives great info an knowledge on Yoga and how useful it is to build your body strength and look. She's very smart and talented, it's a shame she's not in the WWE anymore *sob* WWE makes alot of bad moves, but what else is new. Another Diva that shines is Ivory, in all the Diva releases she always expresses how happy she is, and how hyper she gets! I always liked that in Ivory, peachiness!I recommend this video, Tori's inner/outer beauty is worth it! As well as the rest of the Divas!
summary: One of the best Diva releases, and the very first!
Title: WWF: Divas - Postcard from the Caribbean VHS
